titleStmt.title: The notion of schism stated according to the antients, and considered with reference to the non-conformists, and the pleas for schismaticks examined being animadversions upon the plea for the non-conformists : with reflections on that famous Tract of schism, written by Mr. Hales in two letters to a very worthy gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Conold, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for William Oliver and George Rose ... and are to be sold by them ..., and R. Chiswell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
